>sample add.cl
(A <?> B = C)

100.00 <?> 2.20 = 102.20
101.00 <?> 2.20 = 103.20
102.00 <?> 2.20 = 104.20
103.00 <?> 2.20 = 105.20
104.00 <?> 2.20 = 106.20
105.00 <?> 2.20 = 107.20
106.00 <?> 2.20 = 108.20
107.00 <?> 2.20 = 109.20
108.00 <?> 2.20 = 110.20
109.00 <?> 2.20 = 111.20

(A <?> B = C)
